items.question: How do Circuit Thursdays work?
items.answer: All drivers on the free Circuit plan will have access to Circuit Premium every Thursday for a full 24 hours. You will have instant access in the Circuit Route Planner app.

items.question: Will I have to sign up to a paid plan?
items.answer: Absolutely not! Circuit Thursdays are our gift to you until the end of 2022. As much as we'd love you to subscribe to our Premium Plan, that's completely up to you.

items.question: Does Circuit Thursday have a usage limit?
items.answer: Nope! You can access Circuit Thursday as many times as you like before the end of 2022.

items.question: What is Circuit Premium?
items.answer: The VIP level of Circuit offers unlimited stops and route optimization for $20 per month*. Along with that great benefit, you'll also have access to all the other Circuit Route Planner features, including time windows, optimization, and Fast Package Finder. With Circuit Thursday, you get access to all this every Thursday, for free. *Cost varies by country

items.question: Are there any country limitations?
